translation.en: Sorry, I...
[scoffs] You know how I survive out here?
I don't make noise, and I don't draw attention to myself.
translation.de: Ich mache keinen Lärm und errege keine Aufmerksamkeit.

translation.en: Sorry about that.
It's called stealth --
try using it before I regret bringing you here.
The Autobots ain't paying you for attitude;
translation.de: Man bezahlt dich nicht für Attitüde,

translation.en: we're paying you to find energon.
I ain't a big fan of dead ends, kid.
translation.de: Ich bin kein Fan von Sackgassen, Kleiner.

translation.en: [chuckles] Then you'll be really happy when I activate this hidden hatch, kid.
translation.de: Dann freust du dich, wenn ich diese Geheimtür aktiviere.

translation.en: [Wheeljack] Well... polish my tailpipe!
translation.de: Sieh einer an! Mein liebes Auspuffrohr!

translation.en: You weren't lying after all.
This will keep the Autobots in the fight
for a few cycles... at least.
Wait.
This was a Spacebridge?
Oh, yeah! I miss these beautiful beasts.
translation.de: Ja! Diese prächtigen Bestien fehlen mir.

translation.en: You ever go off-world through one?
Mm, yeah. I used to go racing on Velocitron all the time,
translation.de: Früher fuhr ich ständig auf Velocitron Rennen,

translation.en: before the Decepticons destroyed 'em all.
You wanted me to find energon, so I've led you to some energon.
translation.de: Ich sollte Energon finden, also führte ich dich hin.

translation.en: -We should collect it and go. -[Wheeljack typing]
translation.de: Nehmen wird es, und gehen wir.

translation.en: Are you crazy? Those Seekers will be all over us!
translation.de: Spinnst du? Da jagen uns sofort die Seeker!

translation.en: This could change everything.
I have to tell Prime.
I was hired to find energon, not be dragged into an Autobot crusade.
translation.de: Ich will nicht in einen Autobot-Kreuzzug hineingezogen werden.

translation.en: Is survival a stupid crusade?
I'm trying to survive. Come on!
translation.de: Ich versuche, zu überleben. Komm schon!

translation.en: The Decepticons won't stop, kid.
At some point, you'll have to choose a side.
[Jetfire] He's right.
[Jetfire] Just be careful what side you choose.
translation.de: Aber wähle deine Seite mit Bedacht.

translation.en: You seem lost, Autobot.
translation.de: Du scheinst dich verirrt zu haben, Autobot.

translation.en: The Surrender Stations are that way.
translation.de: Zu den Kapitulations-Stationen geht es da lang.

translation.en: Unless you'd prefer we surrender you here.
translation.de: Es sei denn, du ziehst es vor, hier zur Kapitulation gezwungen zu werden.

translation.en: I'm not an Autobot.
Thundercracker, scan them.
[Thundercracker] Target: unknown.
[Thundercracker] Target: Wheeljack.
Known collaborator: Optimus Prime, enemy of the state.
-[alert beeping] -[Thundercracker] ID: Autobot.
Looters are to be executed on sight,
let alone Autobots.
[Jetfire] And as the Commander of the Seekers,
I decide how they are dealt with.
translation.de: entscheide ich, wie man mit ihnen verfährt.

translation.en: [growls] You fool! They are the enemy!
translation.de: Du Narr! Sie sind der Feind!

translation.en: If the Seekers were under my command,
translation.de: Stünden die Seeker unter meinem Kommando,

translation.en: you would be dead by my hand.
translation.de: würde ich dich mit meiner eigenen Hand töten.

translation.en: [scoffs] You mean that hand?
The Autobots laugh at us because of him,
translation.de: Seinetwegen lachen uns die Autobots aus,

translation.en: and I say we eliminate all three of them.
translation.de: und ich sage, beseitigen wir sie alle drei.

translation.en: Megatron will reward us for our loyalty.
translation.de: Megatron wird uns für unsere Loyalität belohnen.

translation.en: So... be it.
-[Jetfire and Starscream grunting] -Go! Now!
[Jetfire] You fools! They're getting away!
Uh-oh.
[Decepticons] Hail Megatron!
Did two little Autobots do that to you, Starscream?
translation.de: Haben dir das zwei kleine Autobots angetan, Starscream?

translation.en: I'm not an Autobot.
Starscream was out of line,
so we had a little chat.
Hmm... I see.
We should execute every Autobot on sight!
translation.de: Wir sollten Autobots bei Sichtkontakt hinrichten!

translation.en: This war has dragged on long enough!
translation.de: Dieser Krieg geht schon lange genug!

translation.en: This war was started as a revolution,
translation.de: Dieser Krieg wurde als Revolution begonnen,

translation.en: not a genocide.
For a better Cybertron, we must reach their sparks and minds.
translation.de: Für ein besseres Cybertron müssen wir ihre Sparks und ihren Verstand erreichen.

translation.en: Some of us don't want your vision of Cybertron.
translation.de: Einige von uns wollen deine Vision von Cybertron nicht.

translation.en: You're running low on energon.
You're desperate, taking risks,
translation.de: Ihr seid verzweifelt, geht Risiken ein

translation.en: and over-extending yourselves.
I don't care what you want.
translation.de: Es ist mir egal, was ihr wollt.

translation.en: [groans] However...
I want to see an end to this war as much as you do.
translation.de: ...will ich genauso wie du, dass dieser Krieg endet.

translation.en: Denounce the Autobot fanatics and join us.
translation.de: Denunzier die Autobot-Fanatiker, und schließ dich uns an.

translation.en: Help me put a stop to all of this destruction.
translation.de: Hilf mir, all dieser Zerstörung ein Ende zu machen.

translation.en: Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.
translation.de: Freiheit ist das Recht aller empfindsamen Wesen.

translation.en: Yes.
The words of your leader...
honorable, but senseless.
Yeah, well...
I'll stick with him.
Such disrespect!
He insults you with the words of Prime.
translation.de: Er beleidigt dich mit den Worten Primes.

translation.en: Starscream, back in line.
You are the great Megatron,
and yet they defy you.
translation.de: und dennoch bieten sie dir die Stirn.

translation.en: Such trespass cannot be allowed.
translation.de: Solche Vergehen dürfen nicht geduldet werden.

translation.en: And you...
I'm just trying to survive.
So, a coward then?
Afraid to choose a side.
translation.de: Du scheust dich, eine Seite zu wählen.

translation.en: At least this one wears his allegiance
translation.de: Wenigstens trägt er hier seine Loyalität

translation.en: and his fate with pride.
-Execute them. -Sir?
[Megatron] Starting with the proud Autobot.
translation.de: Fang mit dem stolzen Autobot an.

translation.en: With pleasure, Lord Megatron.
Seekers, at the ready.
-[Jetfire] Aim... -[weapon cocks]
Let them go!
[Megatron] Ah... The noble leader has arrived.
You're in no position to demand anything.
translation.de: Es steht dir nicht zu, Forderungen zu stellen.

translation.en: Accept my treaty.
And condemn all of Cybertron to slavery.
translation.de: Und verdamme alle Einwohner Cybertrons zur Sklaverei.

translation.en: I will not do that, Megatron.
What do you know of slavery,
translation.de: Was weißt du schon von Sklaverei,

translation.en: of the energon mines, or gladiatorial pits?
My brothers and sisters were pre-determined to suffer
translation.de: Meine Brüder und Schwestern waren zum Leiden bestimmt,

translation.en: while you and your kind did nothing!
translation.de: während du und deinesgleichen tatenlos zusaht!

translation.en: Everything that you and I have gone through,
we fought for the same things!
translation.de: kämpften wir für die gleichen Dinge!

translation.en: What you fight for now, Alpha Trion would be ashamed.
translation.de: Alpha Trion würde sich schämen, wenn er wüsste, wofür du kämpfst.

translation.en: Of us both, I think.
translation.de: Er würde sich wohl für uns beide schämen.

translation.en: I will not accept your treaty.
translation.de: Ich werde dein Abkommen nicht akzeptieren.

translation.en: Then we end this war here. Now!
translation.de: Dann beenden wir diesen Krieg. Hier. Jetzt!

translation.en: I'm enjoying this, Prime.
-[Prime groaning] -[Megatron] Get to your feet.
Alpha Trion put us all on the path to freedom
translation.de: Alpha Trion führte uns alle auf den Weg zur Freiheit...

translation.en: and, for that, you betrayed him, Megatron.
translation.de: ...und dafür hast du ihn verraten, Megatron.

translation.en: You...
murdered him.
[Megatron grumbles] You weren't built for this.
You'll never be able to make the decisions Cybertron needs.
translation.de: Die Entscheidungen, die Cybertron braucht, wirst du nie treffen können.

translation.en: Cybertron needs freedom.
Cybertron needs strength...
my strength.
You were always the slower one,
the weaker one.
[Megatron] Seekers, to the air!
Kill her!
Autobots retreat!
-He's not an Autobot. -I'm not an Autobot.
-[Prime] Go! -[Bumblebee grunting]
Don't let them escape!
Elita, now!
-[Elita] Not while you're-- -[Prime] Now!
Well done, Prime.
Well done.
[Wheeljack] Hey, uh, Optimus...
before those Decepticons caught us, we discovered something back there.
translation.de: ...eh uns die Decepticons fanden, hatten wir etwas entdeckt.

translation.en: It will have to wait until we are out of Decepticon territory.
translation.de: Das muss warten, bis wir aus ihrem Gebiet raus sind.

translation.en: [Elita] Who's this?
-[Bumblebee murmurs nervously] -Just an energon scavenger I hired.
He's no Decepticon.
What was that back there?
[groans] I had to move in.
Wheeljack only had astro-cycles left--
Not that. The explosives.
translation.de: Nicht das. Das mit dem Sprengstoff.

translation.en: The idea is to be as far as possible when you blow everything up!
translation.de: Du solltest weit weg sein, wenn du alles hochjagst!

translation.en: I swear, one day, Optimus Prime, you are going to...
translation.de: Optimus Prime, eines Tages wirst du...

translation.en: [sighs] Forget it.
Where's the energon?
translation.de: Wo ist das Energon? Und was bist du?

translation.en: -And what exactly are you? -What am I? Don't you mean who?
translation.de: Wo ist das Energon? Und was bist du? Was ich bin? Nicht, wer?

translation.en: He's a pain in the ass, that's who he is.
translation.de: Er ist eine Nervensäge, das ist er.

translation.en: As far as Megatron is concerned, you're an Autobot now.
translation.de: Was Megatron betrifft, bist du jetzt ein Autobot.

translation.en: I'll tell you what I told flashy-face over there:
translation.de: Ich sage dir es auch dir:

translation.en: I took a job, and the job's done.
Pay me, and I'll be on my way.
translation.de: Bezahle mich, und ich bin weg.

translation.en: If the job's done, where's the energon, energon scavenger?
translation.de: Wenn der Job erledigt ist, wo ist dann das Energon?

translation.en: I was paid to find it.
-I found it. -We will discuss this at headquarters.
translation.de: Das tat ich. Das diskutieren wir im Hauptquartier.

translation.en: -[Bumblebee] I don't wanna go with you! -You're welcome to go back out there
translation.de: Ich will nicht mit! Geh gern wieder dort hinaus,

translation.en: and see how hospitable the Decepticons are.
translation.de: um zu sehen, wie gastfreundlich Decepticons sind.

translation.en: Good point.
So, this is why you need all that energon.
Yeah.
Once the energon runs out,
translation.de: Wenn das Energon zu Ende geht,

translation.en: party's over.
[Prime] Have Red Alert check them out.
[Elita] You should all report to medical.
-I must speak with Ultra Magnus-- -[Elita] Optimus...
if anyone should get checked out by a medic, it's you.
Thank you for your concern, Elita.
Yeah...
well, we can't have our commander getting his brain module caved in.
translation.de: ...das Gehirnmodul unseres Kommandanten muss heil bleiben.

translation.en: -Hey, Optimus, I found the-- -[Prime] We will speak later, Wheeljack.
translation.de: -Optimus, ich habe... -Wir unterhalten uns später, Wheeljack.

translation.en: These hit-and-run missions aren't enough.
Until we find more energon, hit-and-run tactics are all we can afford.
translation.de: Bis wir weiteres Energon finden, können wir uns keine anderen leisten.

translation.en: Cybertron is in ruins.
There may not be more energon.
I fear...
the war is lost.
Don't you believe that as long as we have sparks inside of us
translation.de: Glaubst du nicht, solange wir noch unsere Sparks haben,

translation.en: there is still a chance?
Optimus, at this moment, we must focus on surviving as a race,
translation.de: Wir müssen uns darauf konzentrieren, als Rasse zu überleben,

translation.en: not winning a war.
[Ultra Magnus] There's a reason the Matrix chose you.
translation.de: Die Matrix wählte dich nicht grundlos.

translation.en: There's no one I respect more than you.
translation.de: Ich achte niemanden mehr als dich.

translation.en: But as your military commander, as your friend...
translation.de: Aber als Kommandant und Freund bitte ich dich...

translation.en: accept the treaty.
I... cannot.
We're facing extinction at the hands of the Decepticons.
It is extinction either way.
translation.de: Wir werden so oder so ausgelöscht.

translation.en: You're just as stubborn as Megatron.
translation.de: Du bist genauso stur wie Megatron.

translation.en: Can you check these two out, Doc?
We all know Wheeljack's beyond my medical capabilities.
Ha! Funny.
Got something for you, Doc.
Sorry, that was all I could scrounge up.
Huh, Thoraxal Nodes?
This will get a few Autobots back in working order.
translation.de: Ein paar Autobots bekommen wir damit hin.

translation.en: -Any energon? -No, just those.
translation.de: -Hast du auch Energon? -Nein, nur die da.

translation.en: And this guy.
[groans] Let me look at you.
Looks like you've seen a fair share of action.
-What's your name? -Bumblebee.
[Red Alert] Mm, pretty rough out there on your own, eh, Bee?
translation.de: Es ist hart, da draußen allein zu sein, was?

translation.en: It was fine until I took this job.
translation.de: Bis zu diesem Auftrag ging es.

translation.en: [Red Alert] How about I help you patch some of this up?
Yeah, sure.
thanks.
Is this all that's left of the Autobots?
It may look bad, but I assure you,
translation.de: Es mag schlimm aussehen, aber ich versichere dir:

translation.en: it's as bad as it looks.
I was a doctor before the war,
translation.de: Vor dem Krieg war ich Arzt,

translation.en: and now, lucky me,
they gave me a blaster and now I'm a...
translation.de: einen Blaster, und nun bin ich...

translation.en: soldier.
We're all soldiers now.
Bumblebee... is it?
-[scoffs] No. -[Prime] No?
No, I'm not signing up for your fight!
-I was not asking you to-- -You were about to.
translation.de: -Darum bat ich nicht... -Das wolltest du aber.

translation.en: -Huh. Am I that obvious? -[chuckles] Kind of.
Look, I appreciate the save back there, but all this…
translation.de: Nett, dass ihr mich gerettet habt, aber das hier... ist nichts für mich.

translation.en: [scoffs] this isn't for me.
translation.de: aber das hier... ist nichts für mich.

translation.en: This is survival, Bumblebee.
No, it's not!
You're fighting to win,
and that's gonna get you all killed.
The Autobots can use someone like you.
translation.de: Die Autobots könnten einen wie dich gebrauchen.

translation.en: [Bumblebee] I'm no soldier.
Neither were any of us.
The Autobots fight for the day we no longer have to fight.
translation.de: Die Autobots kämpfen darum, nicht kämpfen zu müssen.

translation.en: Yeah, well, good luck with your crusade.
Let him go.
Prime, he could give our location away.
translation.de: Er könnte verraten, wo wir sind.

translation.en: Maybe I should...
[growls] We are not the Decepticons!
[calmer] Please... let him go.
Yet again,
the Autobots have escalated this conflict to the point
translation.de: haben die Autobots den Konflikt so weit eskaliert,

translation.en: where we must answer their aggression with force.
translation.de: dass wir mit Gewalt auf ihre Aggressionen reagieren müssen.

translation.en: Under a flag of truce,
Optimus Prime refused my offer of a treaty
translation.de: lehnte Optimus Prime mein Angebot ab, ein Abkommen zu schließen.

translation.en: and instead tried to assassinate me.
translation.de: Stattdessen versuchte er, mich zu ermorden.

translation.en: It pains me to say this,
translation.de: Es tut mir weh, das sagen zu müssen,

translation.en: but I realize now that there can be no peace with the Autobots.
translation.de: aber mir wird klar, dass es keinen Frieden mit den Autobots geben kann.

translation.en: I empower you Decepticons and all of Cybertron
translation.de: Ich ermächtige euch Decepticons und ganz Cybertron dazu,

translation.en: to bring this painful chapter of our history to a close.
translation.de: dieses schmerzhafte Kapitel unserer Geschichte zu Ende zu bringen.

translation.en: Together, we fight for a lasting unity.
translation.de: Gemeinsam kämpfen wir für dauerhafte Einheit.

translation.en: You wanna lose that hand again?
translation.de: Willst du diese Hand wieder verlieren?

translation.en: my Seekers are on the hunt.
translation.de: meine Seeker sind auf der Jagd.

translation.en: What's left of the Autobots won't last much longer--
translation.de: Die Autobots, die übrig sind, halten nicht mehr lange durch.

translation.en: [grunts] You keep saying that time and time again.
If I led the Seekers,
I would have already brought you Prime's head!
translation.de: hätte ich dir schon Primes Kopf geliefert!

translation.en: If you are not careful, your ambition will be your undoing,
translation.de: Wenn du nicht aufpasst, wird dir dein Ehrgeiz zum Verhängnis,

translation.en: And his arrogance.
His arrogance, I actually like.
But neither of you will find Prime.
Not until you really start to hurt him.
translation.de: Erst, wenn ihr wirklich anfangt, ihm wehzutun.

translation.en: We must forge weapons from his weaknesses...
translation.de: Wir müssen Waffen aus seinen Schwächen schmieden...

translation.en: honor... brotherhood...
love.
That's how we'll defeat Prime
and win this war.
